title: Judge Rejects Plea Deal for Man Who Killed Ahmaud Arbery
sub_head: Travis McMichael’s proposed deal to avert hate crimes trial was denounced by Arbery’s family
body:
A federal judge rejected a plea agreement Monday that would have averted a hate crimes trial for the man convicted of murdering Ahmaud Arbery.
Mr. Arbery’s parents had denounced the proposed deal for Travis McMichael, and the judge proceeded with plans to summon potential jurors next week.
